name: Coconut Library
short_description:
The Coconut Library is an Objective-C class library 
for PC-UNIX systems and MacOS X.
This library is designed to develop software which works unix systems and MacOS X. And depends on Cocoa library for MacOS or Cacao library for unix systems.
